        Responsibilities:
Responsible for respective Zone’s Electrical AT and maintain very good
standard of installation at site to improve the overall Quality.
Daily and Monthly progress report updating.
Follow up with ZDM and Vendor teams for work progress at sites.
Conduct periodic Quality inspections for Electrical AT for new built sites
and upgrade sites so as to ensure the good health and uptime of sites.
To check Site Quality as per BOQ allotted and to track if there is any BOQ
deviation and to report that deviation to Planning Team and get that
rectified.
Take responsibility to clear punch points along with deployment team with
in SLA and Declare FAT compliance before declaring RFIed sites
Maintain  all  site  Documents  and  assist  CQH  to  maintain  site  folder
containing all site related documents required as per standard technical
guidelines.
Train vendors to Improve Quality of installation work to increase Electrical
FTR ratio.
Coordinates with CQH and CPH to ensure timely reporting of BOQ non-
compliance and deviations with standard layout drawings.
Regular feedback (daily and weekly) to CQH about site progress and issue
if any.
To check NOC integration of sites i.e. whether site is communicating with
NOC.
